attributes.magic: POSIX shell script, Unicode text, UTF-8 text executable, with very long lines (513u)

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature fires on the presence of Base64 encoded URI prefixes (http:// and https://) across any file. The simple presence of such strings is not inherently an indicator of malicious content, but is worth further investigation.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects code found in report on exploits against CVE-2020-5902 F5 BIG-IP vulnerability by NCC group
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog. Which is often used by attacker as a method to hide their tracks
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog - Builtin
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog
Detects attempts to force stop the ufw using ufw-init
Detects attempts to clear logs on the system. Adversaries may clear system logs to hide evidence of an intrusion
Detect use of iptables to flush all firewall rules, tables and chains and allow all network traffic

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: User Has Been Deleted Via Userdel
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of the "userdel" binary. Which is used to delete a user account and related files. This is sometimes abused by threat actors in order to cover their tracks

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Indicator Removal on Host - Clear Mac System Logs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects deletion of local audit logs
Detects usage of crontab to list the tasks of the user
Detects usage of system utilities to discover system network connections

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:116; sid:58; rev:2; msg:"(tcp) experimental TCP options found"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type decode; classtype:protocol-command-decode;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: (stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset sent
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:129; sid:8; rev:2; msg:"(stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset sent"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type preproc; classtype:protocol-command-decode;)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered miner. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.
